website_summaries.verdict: This clever system enables putting at 4 speeds and tracks the path of the ball across its surface.
pros: Putting speeds are subtle but noticeable and can be controlled by adjusting surface
Ball “tracks” through nap, making it easy to determine sidespin, skid, and more
cons: Nap must be brushed between putts to keep ball from following earlier track

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put down, easy to put up.
customer_reviews.text: I like that this mat is easy to assemble and disassemble. And when you roll it out it lays flat with no issues. I don't notice much difference between the various speeds, to be honest, but that's probably due to my terrible putting than the product. When the mat is out it doesn't take up too much space which works well for me since I like to use it in my entry hallway.
customer_reviews.author: J-FullTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted this for Christmas. He absolutely loves it. It rolled right out nice and flat-no corners were lifting. There is allot that you can do with this, and my husband was really impressed. I am going to be getting one for my dad for father's day so he can practice inside too! My only complaint is that this came delivered in the box it comes in-so my husband knew ahead of time that I got it for him. If I would have known that, I would have put the gift option- I figured it would come in a normal amazon box and it did not.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to perFECT your putting!!
customer_reviews.text: The variable speeds are amazing -- our home course usually runs around an 11, while some of the muni-courses run about an 8 - so depending on where we're playing, we practice putting to those speeds. It's great for some friendly putting competition!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Mark

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great
customer_reviews.text: Awesome practice aid! My putting has seriously improved, but it’s not so much about this mat specifically, this mat gave me the ability to realistically practice putting in my home. If your not practicing how can your putting get better? For me this mat was a perfect decision and training aid. The felt speed directions make this mat unique and worth the buy. Awesome product
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Winkowski

customer_reviews.title: Great putting green
customer_reviews.text: I debating buying any putting green mainly because I thought there is limited benefit from putting down a straight line. However I find this mat to quite good and well made. There is a very noticeable difference between the speeds, changing the mat speed is easy, the bumper ends saves you from chasing missed balls and the provided target hole is one of the better ones I've used and even bought another to have 2. The mat rolls out smooth and lays flat without getting bunched up. As far as putting mats go, I highly recommend this for practice.
customer_reviews.author: K.R.

customer_reviews.title: Greatest Training aid!!
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this putting mat to anyone who wants to improve putting skill! Center line and trace on the map helped me to see why my ball didn't go in on the green. I have been consistently hitting the ball to my left and not knowing it until I actually see the trace. After understanding that I have bad address and swing, I would improve my putting stoke a lot. Thanks for making the great product! Keep up the good work!
customer_reviews.author: comgenii

customer_reviews.title: Roll the ball straight
customer_reviews.text: Normally dont review things, but I have had several putting greens over the years and this is by far my favorite, the line in the middle really helps to tell you if your rolling the ball straight or pulling it or pushing it, I added an automatic ball returner at the end and now it's perfect you dont have to walk and get the ball constantly, what's also nice is it has 1 foot sections so you can work on your distance control and do some drills with it. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Trap shooter

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and great for practice
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today and love putting on it so far. The variable speed is pretty cool. I’ve only done three of the speeds, but each had a noticeable difference. The slow was pretty slow, which is nice because the course I play most sometimes has very slow greens. It seems like a good quality mat. The accessories are something I probably wont use much. Just want to focus on being able to hit my line. I paired it wit a putting hole that shoots the ball back (which is nice not having to retrieve) and an eye line putting trainer.
customer_reviews.author: Itsybee

customer_reviews.title: No Brainer
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money and works like a dream. I love the way you can modify the putting speed and see the ball track. It works great for working out the slight draw I have in my putting stroke to get after a dead straight putt. It even comes with a silicon putting cup that works great. The only thing I'd like to see is a longer mat so I can even practice on 15-20 foot putts in the off season. Others in my family, however, may disagree with this request.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn A. Crump

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Yes, there is some difference in speed depending on direction you putt, but there is no ball return. And, as others have noted, once you putt in one direction the ball trails effectively minimize the speed differential that was supposed to occur. If I had it to do over again, i would buy a putting trainer that provides the ball return capability.
customer_reviews.author: LongPlay

customer_reviews.title: Nothing new and boring...
customer_reviews.text: Finally got my own putting mat but felt disappointed. Played with my friend on his Proinfinity mat for years and I thought Varispeed is cheaper and better so I bought my own. However when I opened it and found the quality is almost the same and there is no any new thing better than my friend's two years old mat. I also found I didn't save any money because the shipping fee is more expensive. Please make some new accessories and new ways to play otherwise this mat makes us feel boring.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Lee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect putting green!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing putting mat! I recommended it to our golf school. It stores easily. It is a nice length with good distance measures. I LOVE the fact that you can see the ball’s track (assuming you’ve brushed the mat). We’ve been overjoyed with the mat and value it provides, especially with so many indoor, virtual lessons right now.
customer_reviews.author: Golden

customer_reviews.title: Straight putts
customer_reviews.text: You will never know if you are able to hit a straight putt until you use something like this. I am so confident I can hit a straight putt now because of this green. I almost never miss inside 5 feet now where as before I was 50/50 because I was not hitting the ball straight. This gives you the confidence to putt which is critical to making putts. It can be rolled out anywhere flat. You can change to 4 different putting speeds based on how you roll the carpet with the provided roller.
customer_reviews.author: Arati Patel

customer_reviews.title: Golf people need to stop being selfish with the sport
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. A little bit of price gouging in my opinion. I like many other golfers can afford the cost. But if we ever expect this sport to survive we need to find a way to reach more youth. I've watched as the local golf team has lost talent over the years.
customer_reviews.author: squizzelnuts

customer_reviews.title: such a great gift I bought another
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these as a gift for a friend and he liked it so much that I bought another one for my father-in-law. I haven't used it myself but it has been well received by both of them, so it turned out to be a great Christmas gift purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Miraclemike3

customer_reviews.title: First day went well, will update review as I go! Corona Quarantine Practice Tool!!
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box it is a very clean product that has everything promised. I have yet to use the 'breaking' tool for putts so I am excited to try that out. Mat rolls very smooth, there is a very noticeable difference in the green speeds on which way you putt. The lines that are produced by your putts are a great way to see where your line is and why your putt may have gone the way that it did. This should be a great tool during corona quarantine to boost my putting game and take a few strokes off my game!
customer_reviews.author: BigBuckPNW

customer_reviews.title: This product is for speed and consistency
customer_reviews.text: While the bump/break is great for having fun, this mat is for understanding alignment, speed, and consistency. 8ft and in are most important in saving strokes and this product helps create that ability to gain strokes. If you are looking to self help your putting or just need more putts to get comfortable over the ball; buy this product and practice 15 minutes a day.
customer_reviews.author: PJ Santilli

customer_reviews.title: When working from home, why not work on your putting?
customer_reviews.text: During long conference calls, my golfer is often standing at the mat, practicing. All the little add-ins help change it up. I don't golf, so I took a gamble. It paid off!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great practice for your putting!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and use, rolls up nicely for storage, but rolls back out flat every time. Only downside is the cat loves to lay on it which forces us to putt around him! LOL
customer_reviews.author: KindleChick

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations
customer_reviews.text: Arrived a day early and it was easy to assemble. The different speeds will help when on the course plus I can make a game of putting. Hopefully my putting will improve as a result of this mat.
customer_reviews.author: keith gresham

customer_reviews.title: Why didnt i think of this
customer_reviews.text: great quality, lots of fun putting with sons, lends itself to making up different and challenging putting games...putting confidence way up now on all of us
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Gomez Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Where’s the second cup?
customer_reviews.text: I will say the grain concept is a good one. However only one cup doesn’t make sense. For this price I would think two cups should be supplied. Obviously the marketing dept overlooked putting both directions. So if I want to buy one more cup where can Imbuy a duplicate cup?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Learn the art of true roll with this tool.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tool to sharpen your putting mechanics. Will let you know instantly what your path tendencies are. Get ready for strokes gained by putting.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Caballero

customer_reviews.title: Excellent putting mat
customer_reviews.text: 4 different speeds, I need to use the fastest to match the courses I play in Las Vegas. I 1-putt way more often after getting this mat. Great value :-)
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Syvertsen

customer_reviews.title: Creased
customer_reviews.text: Came with a large crease. Tried to brush outm no luck. Don't they have quality control? Makes me doubt other claims or features
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works as described
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband so he could golf in his "golf room" but the floors are not even so he is now using it in the living room. Good times!!!
customer_reviews.author: Maura

customer_reviews.title: Putting green
customer_reviews.text: Good putting green to practice in the house, it gives you various speeds and the product is easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi from El Paso, Texas

customer_reviews.title: great for practice
customer_reviews.text: Have very much enjoyed this for my practice. Has allowed me to work on various aspects of my putting, aim, speed, etc., in my home.
customer_reviews.author: S. J. Musco

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Got this way cheaper on Amazon than Golf Galaxy. Good quality. Exactly as expected. Even the kids use it!
customer_reviews.author: Carol R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Practice Tool
customer_reviews.text: Have it to my golfing, volleyball coach brother. He loves it and man is he picky (Especially about sporting equipment! Guess that’s what happens when you lively hood depends on it!
customer_reviews.author: April E. Matthews

customer_reviews.title: The Best Putting Mat.
customer_reviews.text: What a great product. It's well made and does exactly what you want. The pile is adjusted with a roller that comes with the mat. It can make putting a fun game with the mates / kids. Game instructions included.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Blo

customer_reviews.title: It works great
customer_reviews.text: It's a great putting matt. I don't suggest folding it over, as it gets a crease. Instead, roll it up. Good two speed design.
customer_reviews.author: RWC

customer_reviews.title: No Instructions or "Training Guide with Pro Training Exercises and Fun Games"
customer_reviews.text: This did not come with any instructions and it clearly states on the box it comes with "Training Guide with Pro Training Exercises and Fun Games". Can someone please send these to us so we can try this out and change our rating?
customer_reviews.author: Claudine O'Byrne

customer_reviews.title: nice roll that center line works
customer_reviews.text: I use this to alternate between 3.5 footers and 8 or more footers. I use it right before I play for about 50 putts and make most of the short straight ones on the course. After all who wants to miss a 3.5 footer ? That center line is instant feedback.
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a much better quality mat than any other I have owned. It has a heavy rubber backing and lays flat every time. The putting surface rolls smooth and you can easily see where you ball rolled. Worth the extra $$ to this quality mat.
customer_reviews.author: Scott G.

customer_reviews.title: Great to improve your putting
customer_reviews.text: Rolls true. Variable speed is great. Putting is def getting a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Jhoi Vorachack

customer_reviews.title: very nice putting mat.
customer_reviews.text: very well made, you can change the speeds and the fastest is very fast. Stores away great. Overall a great putting mat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Item was as described and reviews helped
customer_reviews.text: My husband and daughter really love mat and it really helped my daughter during her golf match
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a must have
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have...huge hit at parties...great for a game with multiple people or solo to practice your putting...several of my friends purchased one after playing on mine
customer_reviews.author: Blake Nafziger

customer_reviews.title: Great green
customer_reviews.text: Great putting green. Bought for an event at work and the guys love it.
customer_reviews.author: MELISSA A STITES

customer_reviews.title: Great for indoor use!
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves it! Easy to set up on solid surface, tile or wood floor.
customer_reviews.author: L.Leahy

customer_reviews.title: Great for practice
customer_reviews.text: Ball rolls smooth. I like having the lines and distance markers. Carpet fibers definitely have a grain so you get different speed when putting in each direction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice for Serious Golfers
customer_reviews.text: This is the putting mat you should get if you are serious about improving your putting. I’ve had it for a few days now and love it. The different stimps you can set the mat to are really cool. Very high quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Noah C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Item is perfect!!! Works perfect looks perfect ladies flat right away everything is just as described couldn't ask for anything more
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Millsap

customer_reviews.title: Great Value-Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this mat! Had one that was gifted to me and enjoyed it so much that I turned around and bought one for a family member who loves it just as much. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Matt G

customer_reviews.title: Excellent putting mat
customer_reviews.text: Very good putting mat which facilitates practice and improvement of putting skills.
customer_reviews.author: RonJ

customer_reviews.title: Don’t pass this up
customer_reviews.text: We are loving this and use it in the living room. Great practice time or game time fun!
customer_reviews.author: Mauckfam

customer_reviews.title: Good time great fun
customer_reviews.text: Very fun way to practice putting. More options than you think.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Speed adjustment nice feature
customer_reviews.text: Being able to adjust the speed was extremely useful, dad loved this as a Father’s Day gift!
customer_reviews.author: J.Fazzio

customer_reviews.title: It really helps my stroke
customer_reviews.text: This mat is amazing, you can definitely tell a difference between the slow and fast side of the mat. The straight line down the middle is the best teacher. A great product!
customer_reviews.author: Peterk

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. I wish it was a little wider, but overall good.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Dobberstein

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Thick mat unrolled with no creases or wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: BATES

customer_reviews.title: Great putting practice tool!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality materials and a nice design layout. Easy use.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Cornejo

customer_reviews.title: Break Wedge missing
customer_reviews.text: Missing a break wedge which was supposed to be in the box. Item seems to have been used and returned.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact that it is easy to get out and put away. Great quality
customer_reviews.author: TERESA  SIMS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Perfect to use in at home or work.
customer_reviews.author: lisa cantrell

customer_reviews.title: Well made not for warm climates
customer_reviews.text: This product is made well but isn’t really long enough but will work well in areas of long bad winter weather
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: VariSpeed Putting System - Practice 4 Different Speeds On One Mat!
product_meta.description: The VariSpeed Putting System makes practice fun! The VariSpeed mat offers course-like conditions with the ability to customize putting speed and add realistic breaks. The special mat fibers allow you to see the exact path of each putt with visible ball traces. The included booklet illustrates useful training exercises and fun games to keep you going for hours. You are only limited by your imagination!
feature_bullets: ADJUSTABLE SPEEDS – Choose from 4 Stimp tested speeds ranging from 7.5-13 on one indoor putting green
VISIBLE BALL TRACES – Evaluate every putt by being able to see the exact path of your ball
CUSTOM BREAKS – With the included adjustable break wedge you can set up realistic break conditions
SMART GUIDELINES – Allow for you to perfect your putt and enable several fun games to be played
PRACTICE OR FUN – The included booklet covers pro training exercises and fun games for multiple players
COMPACT STORAGE – The 10 foot x 20 inch VariSpeed mat easily rolls up for fast, convenient storage and set up

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
